gist.headline: New look for the hive
gist.blurb: We've updated our social media engine with a unified pixel art style and smoother publishing.
gist.summary: Standardized social media image generation to square format and migrated Instagram publishing to Buffer.
gist.impact: More consistent visual identity across platforms and reliable Instagram posting.
gist.visual_concept: A bee artist in a pixel art studio, painting on square canvases. The bee is organizing frames or adjusting a camera, representing the new unified visual identity and format standardization.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a bee artist painting square canvases in a studio. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. The bee is organizing frames. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee organizing square canvases with a unified style. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes. Social media icons in pixel art style. Emotionally warm, organized workspace.
